ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“…Sounds like
something opened up…”

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“A model of Midgar…a city born
from the earth's Mako.”

“Some parts are missing…”
{CHOICE}Insert the Midgar parts
{CHOICE}Leave it alone

{Cloud}
“Midgar…a city born
from the earth's Mako.
A model of the city…”{PAUSE}“When construction of Sector 6
finishes, Shinra's plan
will be complete.”{PAUSE}“That must be why he took
{Aeris}…”
